author: Donald Windle Jr
title: Comment on ‘Alone’ Survivalists: Meet the Cast by Donald Windle Jr
text:
Get The Top 5 News Stories Each Day in Your InBox 
We will never share your email address. Get Heavy's Top 5 News Stories Every Day 
We will never share your email address. ‘Alone’ Survivalists: Meet the Cast Published Updated 11:22 pm EST, June 21, 2015 255 Comments By Lauren Weigle 5.4k Share Tweet Follow 'Alone' Cast The History Channel has a new reality show called Alone , filled with a cast of survivalists who have to fend for themselves in the Vancouver Island wilderness. The official synopsis of the show reads: Carrying only what they can fit in a backpack, the survivalists are completely separated from one another in harsh, unforgiving terrain to hunt, build shelters and fend off predators. They will face extreme isolation and psychological distress as they plunge into the unknown, self-documenting their experience. "Alone" is the ultimate test of man’s will to survive. The person who lasts the longest before tapping out is the winner of a $500,000 prize. Unlike other shows like Survivor or Naked And Afraid , these survivalists will have no teams, no partner to keep them company, no production or camera crew and no show host. The series is self-documented as each of the cast members battle the elements, build shelters, protect themselves from predators and try to stay sane. Now that you're up to speed on the new, dangerous series, click through our gallery to get to know each of the 10 survivalists who are in it to win it. (A&E Network/History - Copyright 2015) Next Image: Alone 1 Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . June 21, 2015 11:22 pm
